authPages.recoverPasswordSuccessMessage: New password is sent to your email
authPages.signupSuccessMessage: The password is sent to your email

errors.User with this email already registered: User with this email already registered
errors.Network Error: Server is not available. Check your internet connection.

catalog.whatToDo: To start track events, you need to connect one of our Catchers
catalog.whatIsCatcher: Catcher is a small script that will catch errors in your application and send it to Hawk.
catalog.migrationFromSentryDescription: Hawk can accept errors from Sentry SDK. You will need to change only one line.

catchers.nodejs: Track errors from the server application built on JS or TS
catchers.php: Can be connected as a standalone script or as a monolog provider
catchers.js: Advanced catcher with source maps support. Supports TS.
catchers.python: Small, simple and full-featured catcher for any kind of scripts.
catchers.go: Deadly simple and fast errors tracking
catchers.kotlin: Tracks errors in Kotlin and Java apps

catalog.hereIsToken: Here is your Integration token. You can also found it in the project settings later.
catalog.readmeDisclaimer: And the most actual guide at the README.md file in Catcher’s repo. As well as its source code.
catalog.hereIsDSN: Here is your DSN. You can also found it in the project settings later.
catalog.useDSNText: All Sentry SDK in one way or another support the `dsn` parameter. Pass the received DSN to the Sentry SDK options.

projects.noEventsPlaceholder: No events found with this filter

creationDialog.description: To start track events from your application, add it as a Project and get an Integration Token.
creationDialog.title: Add a project

settings.removeConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this project?

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.revokeText: You can {revoke} this token and get the new one.

revokeConfirmation.title: Revoke integration token?
revokeConfirmation.description: After this action, Hawk will stop accepting events with the old integration token. You will need to replace it with a new one in your project.

integrations.sentryDSNText: If you use Sentry SDK, you can use this DSN to send errors to Hawk.
integrations.sentryDSNTextNoToken: It seems, you have an old integration token. Try to revoke it and get the new one.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emailDescription: Max frequency is 1 alert in 10 min
notifications.receiveSeenMoreDescription: All event occurrences. Max frequency is 1 alert/min.
notifications.includingWordsDescription: Only events that includes passed words

patterns.title: Events Merging
patterns.description: Here you can set up rules for manually merging events. This is useful for grouping similar events with slightly different titles but the same underlying nature.

patternList.title: Patterns
patternList.emptyMessage: You don't have any patterns yet.

channelDescriptions.emailEmptyWarning: To enable email notifications you need to fill an email in Account Settings
channelDescriptions.desktopPush: Native notifies through the Hawk Desktop

actionDescriptions.IssueAssigning: When someone will assign you to the task
actionDescriptions.WeeklyDigest: Most important events for passed week
actionDescriptions.SystemMessages: Only important messages from Hawk team

chooseTariffPlanDialog.title: Choose a plan
chooseTariffPlanDialog.description: All plans includes all available features. If you have questions on plans, please contact us by team@hawk.so
chooseTariffPlanDialog.onSuccess: Workspace plan has been successfully changed
chooseTariffPlanDialog.onError: Unable to change workspace plan due to an error, please try again later
chooseTariffPlanDialog.confirmSetToFreePlanDescription: The old plan will be canceled. Unused errors and time will not be refunded.
chooseTariffPlanDialog.confirmSetToPaidPlanDescription: The old plan will be canceled. Unused errors and time will not be refunded. You will need to pay for a new tariff plan.

creationDialog.description: Workspace will contain your projects. You’ll able to invite team members to join workspace and access projects.
creationDialog.title: Organize new workspace

team.title: Team
team.brokenLinkNotification: It seems, your link is broken

billing.title: Billing information
billing.cancelSubscriptionText: Are you sure you want to cancel subscription? Current plan will be valid until the end of the paid period.

volume.title: Used Volume
volume.description_1: Your workspace's plan includes %{msg} accepted events per month.
volume.description_2: If you would like to increase your volume, please contact us via the button below

errors.accessDenied: You don't have enough rights to view this page

billing.autoPayIsOn: Autopay is on. The next payment date:

processPayment.description: This form allows you to fund the workspace’s balance. After selecting the amount you will be redirected to the payment service.

notifications.error: There was an error while paying

paymentDetails.title: Payment details
paymentDetails.description: You are about to purchase a monthly plan for the workspace. Your payment will be secured. We won’t access and store your wire transfer data. You will get an invoice on your email. Read more about {0}.
paymentDetails.acceptPaymentAgreement: I understand and accept the payment agreement (required)
paymentDetails.didNotAccept: You need to accept the payment agreement to proceed with payment
paymentDetails.didNotAcceptRecurrentPaymentAgreement: You need to accept the recurrent payments agreement to proceed with payment
paymentDetails.didNotAcceptChargingEveryMonth: You need allow charges from your bank card every month to proceed with payment

notifications.error: A payment processing error occurred. Please try again

autoProlongation.title: Subscription
autoProlongation.description: You are about to subscribe for paid tariff plan. That means that when the next payment date comes, the plan price will be automatically charged from your card.
autoProlongation.acceptRecurrentPaymentAgreement: I understand and accept the recurrent payments agreement
autoProlongation.allowingChargesEveryMonth: I allow charges from my bank card every month

cloudPaymentsWidget.description: Payment for tariff "{tariffPlanName}" for {workspaceName} workspace for a month
cloudPaymentsWidget.descriptionCardLinking: A temporary charge of 1 USD will be made to verify your card. The amount will be refunded automatically.

cardLinking.description: You are about to subscribe, which will start on
cardLinking.step1: We will charge and immediately refund 1 USD to link your card.
cardLinking.step2: The first regular payment will be charged on {date}, and the subscription will start from that day.
